entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 March 2023
